name: get_a_specific_remote_job_by_id
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool remote_jobs_api.
Tool description: Get a list of remote jobs from different resources: weworkremotely, remoteok, GitHub, StackOverflow, Twitch, Mailchimp, Figma...
API description: Using the id of the job returned from /jobs route, get more details about a specific job

is_id.description: The unique identifier of the job to fetch details for.
